TopicTitle: EVA'd Kerbals Can Collect Data From Devices

Articles.Content:
So, I just had this thought: if there is a probe landed on a planet with stored science, it would be really cool if EVA'd Kerbals could collect said science into an "inventory" of sort.

This thought came to me as i was piloting my Duna lander probe (my first interplanetary mission in career mode!) and I realized there's no real point in storing the data because the vessel is never going to be recovered. However, when i eventually send Kerbals over there, I could have them collect this data and make it be worthwhile to store.

Thanks For Reading,

Happy Flying!

As a means of transferring the data//samples//whatever between crafts? I can certainly see where that'd be useful. The only other option would perhaps be sure to equip ships that aren't going to make it back alone with a docking port and haul them back with a mothership or something.
